email_content:
Hi Michael,

Hope you’re doing well. Below are the most recent updates from my notes on the families we’re supporting together:

• Case 001 – Thompson family: The family has now been placed in a stable housing situation. I’ll arrange a follow-up visit in about four weeks to confirm that utilities are fully connected and to discuss next-step job-search support.

• Case 002 – Rivera family: They’ve been officially enrolled in our food-assistance programme. I’ve also pencilled in an orientation call with them for Friday, 25 Feb to determine eligibility for child-care subsidies.

• Case 003 – Green family: Their application for medical aid is currently under review by the county office. We’ve submitted the extra documentation they requested and we should receive a decision within the next two weeks.

Please let me know if you need any more details or if there’s anything you’d like me to prioritise.

Thanks for all you do!

Best,
[Your Name]
